full_script: Introductory visual for A cat talking about its eyes and ears. Introductory visual for A cat talking about its eyes and ears. Visual representation of: You think you have privacy in this house? That's c... You think you have privacy in this house? That's cute. I know when you wake up when you go to bed and how often you pee. I know you eat snacks at midnight and pretend it didn't happen. Concluding visual for A cat talking about its eyes and ears. I see the way you talk to your plants. I hear your cringe voice memos before you delete them. I am always watching, silently from a shelf, or a doorway, or top of the fridge like a judgmental gargoyle. I don't judge out loud, but I do absorb everything. So when I stare at you with deadpan eyes, just know I have seen things.

I see the way you talk to your plants. I hear your cringe voice memos before you delete them. I am always watching, silently from a shelf, or a doorway, or
top of the fridge like a judgmental gargoyle. I don't judge out loud, but I do absorb everything. So when I stare at you with deadpan eyes, just know I have seen things.
